value:
When I saved Mareeta from slavers,
she could say only her own name.$k$pNow that child has grown...and to
me, she has become a daughter,
beloved and irreplaceable.

I recall nothing of my past. Only that
I was found washed up on the shore
by villagers over a decade ago.

Worry fatigues the mind and dulls
judgment. You must rest. Please,
go spend some time in bed.

I was invited to tea, but...would you
mind joining me? I'm not used to
such things.

Who...am I? Was I married? Did I have
children? I can't remember even that.

I'm Eyvel, of Fiana village. Please
accept a greeting from me in place
of $Nf.

I will not run or hide. I will fight in
a fashion worthy of the Freeblades.

...Strange. Even without memories,
this body of mine remembers its way
around the battlefield.
Ugh... My head... It's swimming...

Oh, thank you. But you needn't fuss
over me. I'll be fine.

I am Eyvel, mistress of Fiana. I may
not look it, but I'm not bad with a
sword. If you're in need, I can help.

I've recovered most of my strength,
and I owe much of my progress to
you, $Nu.$k$pYet the block on my memory lingers.
I've met some people who I feel I may
know, but...I recall nothing of myself.$k$pI am uneasy not knowing myself,
but it leads me to believe that there
must be some purpose to it all...$k$pThough I cannot be sure if it was
something I've done or something
I WILL do that has led to this...$k$pFor now, I will just be Eyvel of Fiana,
and I will fight for my friends...
Including you.
てやっ
甘い！
ぐっ…
Careless...
I fear no enemy.
Atone for your crimes!
For the Freeblades!
Stand tall!
Don't...give up...
Huhu
I am Eyvel—a simple mercenary from Fiana.
I hope you take the burden of leadership seriously.

I recall nothing of my past. For all I know, there's
a family out there wondering what's become of me.
I hardly recognize Lord Leif these days. He's become quite the leader.

Mareeta is my daughter, now.
I will never part with her.

The emptiness of my past still troubles me.
Perhaps someday I'll be able to just let go.

Whenever I start to feel control over my life, I'm reminded
how helpless I am against the whims of fate.
As you say.
Use discretion.
Together.
